ProximityDetector¶

The base class for defining Detector classes.

class Leap::Unity::ProximityDetector

Detects when the parent GameObject is within the specified distance of one of the target objects.

Since
4.1.2

Public Members

float OffDistance

The distance in meters between this game object and the target game object that will turn off the detector.

Since
4.1.2

float OnDistance

The distance in meters between this game object and the target game object that will pass the proximity check.

Since
4.1.2

ProximityEvent OnProximity

Dispatched when the proximity check succeeds.

The ProximityEvent object provides a reference to the proximate GameObject.

Since
4.1.2

float Period

The interval at which to check palm direction.

Since
4.1.2

bool ShowGizmos

Whether to draw the detector’s Gizmos for debugging.

(Not every detector provides gizmos.)

Since
4.1.2

string TagName

Include objects with the specified tag in the list of target objects.

Objects are not added dynamically, however, so objects spawned with the tag will not be included.

Since
4.1.3

GameObject[] TargetObjects

The list of objects which can activate the detector by proximity.

Since
4.1.2
